Most of your colleagues know about your diapers at this point, but it's still far from proper to walk into work in this state, incontinent or not... unfortunately, though, it's a choice you can't go back on right now.

The knowledge that you're not about to be late gives you a sliver of relief, but you're still mortified that you're even outside like this, let alone going to work... the feeling of your still-warm overnight mess smushing up against your rear as you shift your weight from side to side doesn't help you calm down, either, although it does, at least, feel comfortable.

You're quite tall, with a svelte figure, and being on the cusp of adulthood has made you an independent, confident and slightly smug young lady. However, there's one thing in particular that prevents you from flying the nest completely - your diapers.

A curious congenital condition that runs in your mom's side of the family made it impossible for you to make that critical step away from wearing your toilet around your waist. It was a source of much embarrassment in your younger years, but now that you're less than a year away from putting your childhood behind you, you've come to terms with your unique situation. In fact, you'd be lying if you said you didn't find it sort of thrilling to be able to 'let loose' whenever you like. You're obviously capable of changing and cleaning yourself at this age, but - weird as it is - you're kind of attached to the idea of letting your mom do it for you. After all, having over forty years of experience changing herself has given her something of a talent.

Presently, it's a pleasant August afternoon, and you're rolling around uncomfortably in bed. Lazy, school-free summer days translate to tumultuous sleeping schedules and late wakings, and although you're enjoying all the free time before your senior year starts, your own inability to wake up before the afternoon kicks in is starting to bug you. 12421.content:
Simple, standard and yet; effective. The seventeen years of experience of having to wear diapers placed you in the position of instead opting to wear more compact, discreet and lightweight diapers instead of the thick, heavily absorbent brands. The freedom of movement, slimmer profile and less bulk are perfect for school and public settings.

Your bedroom was dim. The curtains were closed and a quick glance at the alarm clock confirmed it was mid-afternoon. You slowly rise, blinkling. A single hand brushing the messy feathers from your face while another continued to sensually rub your padded crotch.

"Two o' clock." You mumble indignantly, inhaling, your head falls back onto the pillow below with a loud thump. "Two in the afternoon. I don't believe this--"

"Two o' clock!" Your bedroom door was abruptly kicked open; soon swinging and slamming against the wall -- allowing Mother to enter. She proudly sang, chirping and humming with a small tray in her hands. "Is my hatchie hungry? I've got some breakfast for you."

Her singing was enough to bring a sharp headache. You recoil, slightly dipping under the sheets to further hide yourself as your Mother approaches. You look onward as the tray of food was casually rested nearby. "Oh, sweetie. You've been sleeping an awful lot recently. Is my hatchie staying up a little too late?"

"M-Mom!" You respond, a deep red overcoming your cheeks and onto your beak. "I just woke up!"

She lowers herself onto your bed, gazing lovingly, while adjusting her loose-fitting sweatpants as her own underwear loudly crinkled. You continue to blush, but only at the realisation that the diaper she wore was seemingly swollen around the crotch area.

Your Mother was sweet; compassionate, and understanding to a fault. Her years of expertise of her own condition -- and by extension, yours, had always been comforting in the instances where the stresses of dealing with your condition arised. If anything; her infinite wisdom and comfort was also irksome to a degree, as growing up, you found her doting and caring attitude to be overbearing and embarassing.

"Here's breakfast;" Your Mother gestured toward the tray of food. "Or should I say -- afternoon breakfast? A cup of tea, lightly done toast with a little bit of butter and an orange. Is that everything for my baby girl?"

"I'm fine, Mom." You're used to the excessive doting. The constantly usage of 'baby girl', 'chick' and 'hatchie' was always going to get under your feathers.

"Good, good. I'm going on a shopping trip a little later. You're more than welcome to join." Your Mother nods, she lifts herself off your bed and waddles over to the door. "I'm leaving at three o' clock for some more diapers and groceries. But before I leave; I need to change out of my... soggy pants."

You roll your eyes, slightly cringing as your Mother practically sang the last part out. You sink further into your pillows and casually grab the pieces of toast -- thinking about the agenda for the today and later tonight.
12421.title: A typical, compact disposable diaper

12422.content:
This diaper is what you may call an overnight diaper. It is a little thicker than the regular diapers that you wear, and is just thick enough to be apparent no matter what pants you wear. Honestly, you didn't really care. It's the first week of summer, and you arn't goin out anytime soon.
You lazily hop out of bed and open your closet. Right now, you are only wearing a diaper and a bra. So you get a loose fitting purple shirt on and some knee-high socks, so your feet don't get cold.

All dressed, you decide to sit down at your desk and go on the computer. You log on to Twitter and see what is going on. Most of the time you look at fashion blogs and stuff like that, but in this instace you feel like getting a good laugh. You close Twitter and open up YouTube. You are about to search something but a ad catches your eye...

"100+ DIAPERS! ALL CHEAP BUT ABSORBENT! BUY NOW!"

You eye the ad but decide to click on it. What you see looks pretty legit. The website is modern and up to date. However, you see a section titled "Find the right diaper for you!" You decided to click on the link. The page directs to a simple looking quiz.
_
FIRST QUESTION:

Why do you need diapers?
_

You answer "Incontinent." and click next.
_
How thick do you like your diapers?


(You can answer this one!)
12422.title: This diaper is made for walk'n...

124222.content: Since I don't have a basic membership, I have to do this. I am so sorry.
124222.title: Overnight thick / Mega thick.

choices: Start polishing off the water bottles
Knock back a couple of capsules of X-LAX
12423.content:
You blush ever-so-slightly as your avian claws sink deeply into your pristine padding, disappearing into the crinkling folds. There's no way you're going anywhere with a diaper this big, even though you haven't even used it yet! You're not wearing much else, either - just an open pyjama shirt, with nothing underneath to conceal your petite chest. Your mom probably wouldn't approve, but you're almost eighteen, right? You can wear what you want - and if that means wearing little other than an industrial-strength diaper, then so be it.

You climb to your knees and adjust the poofy garment's tapes a little. Even on your knees, your unique underwear almost touches the bed below you. You're nearly immobile already, but you can't help but wonder how you'd look if you added a little mass to your over-large diaper... a smirk creeps across your beak as your eyes dart to your bed-side table. Numerous plastic bottles of fresh water, both full and half-full, sparkle appealingly in the afternoon light streaming through your curtains. Next to them sits a discrete little box of pills with the words 'X-LAX' printed on the side in bold brown lettering. You're having trouble remembering why exactly you set all these things up, but you recall that you're still suspiciously dry despite a long, lazy day of rest - it'd probably only take half a bottle of water to change that. However, you're incredibly thickly padded, and it'd be a shame not to use your garment to its fullest.

Firmly electing to avoid half-measures, you lean over to the bedside table (after a brief struggle to get over your own padding) and your hand hovers over the arrayed choices. Where do you start?
12423.title: Extra Thick Padding

choices: Empty your bladder properly, leakage or not
Give a couple of X-LAX pills a shot
124231.content:
Your claws tighten around one of the full bottles and you waste no time in unscrewing the cap, discarding it quickly as you pour the contents of the bottle straight down your throat. There's nothing unusual about the taste or texture - it's water, after all - but the knowledge of what's coming next lends a certain mischievous pleasure to the act of drinking it. Another half-litre of water disappears into your gullet in short order, then another, your eagerness to get to the fun part spurring you on.

It takes you less than five minutes to polish off all six-and-a-half bottles.You collapse back onto the bed once you're sure the last one is empty, dropping as quickly as your over-padded backside will allow, and let out a quiet groan as your hand settles on your slightly distended stomach. You're feeling a little nauseous, but it's nothing serious - or, at least, nothing as serious as what's coming up for you soon. You spend the next half-hour lying there impatiently, giving your tummy an occasional squeeze and poking your midriff experimentally, trying to gauge how full your bladder is without triggering the waterworks prematurely. Every glance down at your extra-thick, extra-comfy, annoyingly clean padding makes you a little more frustrated, but you calm yourself by thinking about how it'll look in another half-hour.

Sure enough, after over thirty minutes of anticipation, a familiar tingle in your nether regions jars you to attention. You know from experience that this is all the warning you're going to get of what's coming as you struggle to kneel up, wincing as your bloated bladder contracts under the pressure of your movements. You just about have time to open your legs a little and rest atop your padding as an all-too-familiar hissing reaches your ears and you feel every muscle in your groin give way, unable to hold back the torrent you sent down.

Your incredibly thick padding grows thicker still as it dutifully absorbs what you drank both recently and last night, crinkling in a satisfying manner and pushing up against the bed-covers below you. It takes a few seconds, but the tell-tale yellow stain of a soaked diaper shows up on your ludicrously well-padded crotch eventually, growing wider and deeper in colour as you continue to fuel it. Your legs widen further and you let out a quiet groan of satisfaction as you sink into your own warm, soaking undergarment, continuing to use it to its fullest as you relax and sink your claws gratefully into your stained, comfy crotch.

It takes over a minute of continuous relief before you finally feel your lower muscles tighten. A quick poke of your bladder confirms that it isn't quite empty yet, but you're kind of glad it stopped leaking - your diaper, despite its size, is yellow from tape to tape, and the leg gains barely cling to your thighs against the litres of liquid sitting inside your padding. You'd probably leak if you went any further, and that's something you don't want to have to clean up. You pull your legs up and sit down in your diaper, delighting as you slowly sink into its comfy, cosy lining. If moving around was tough before, it's surely impossible at this point - your padding would sink almost to your calves, and your legs would be pushed so far apart that walking would be exhausting. No problem, though - you're not going anywhere, and you're fine with that.

After a minute of gently squeezing your diaper up against yourself and shifting around in your seated position, your eyes drift over to the now-empty bedside table. Empty, that is, except for the X-LAX you forewent half an hour ago. You're not sure how your already-struggling padding would cope with a real load, but there's only one way to find out, right? Either that, or you could just keep soaking and throw caution about your bed-sheets to the wind.
124231.title: Starting With Soaking

choices: No more mess - it's time to clean & change
Go for it - what's the worst that could happen?
1242311.content:
With only slight reluctance, you pass over the laxative pills and return your attention to your over-full diaper. There's no telling what'd happen to it if you filled it with one of your typical loads - you're something of a heavyweight, so to speak - let alone how it'd put up with a laxative-assisted delivery. With a dismissive shrug, you instead elect to finish what you started with your bladder.

Squeezing your crotch fondly, you shut your eyes tightly and concentrate hard in an attempt to exert some (very) limited control over affairs below your waist. Normally, you'd be unable to dictate when to start going or when to stop yourself once it's coming out, but in this particular instance, it takes very little goading (and a few gentle prods from your fingers) to get your body to give up what's left of your watery binge from thirty minutes ago. Your nethers tingle once more and the sound of liquid splashing into your over-loaded crotch padding fills the air, immediately putting you at ease as you relax and sink into your newly-warmed garment.

Sure enough, however, you've pushed your huge diaper over its limit. The tell-tale feeling of warm liquid running along your thigh is the first sign that something's up, followed quickly by the quiet pat-pat-pat sound of that same liquid dripping onto the linen sheets below you. You peek between your legs trepidaciously, and - just as you expected - you discover a rapidly-growing puddle soaking into something that certainly isn't your diaper. To make matters worse, the stream leaking from your groin only seems to be getting stronger. The entire situation - your soaked sheets, your cosy, damp seat of a used diaper, your uncertainty over how much more you're going to wet, and most of all your utter inability to prevent it - brings a deep, embarrassed blush and a mischievous smirk to your beak. You've got no choice but to sit here in your diaper and wait until your body is done making a damp mess of your bed, and that fact excites you like nothing else. With a smug giggle, you lean forward and squeeze your leaky diaper crotch with both hands, forcing even more liquid out of the over-stressed leg gains and onto the sheets below. You don't care, really. You're having far too much fun to hold back now.

Finally, however, you feel your nethers run dry - for good this time, you think. You try to pull yourself up a little, but your monstrously large undergarment is far too soaked and swollen to permit you that degree of free movement. You realise, with a little panic and a lot of mischievous pleasure, that you're not going to be able to get to your feet without leaking everywhere. Instead, you shuffle backwards just a little in order to survey the damage. As you expected, the sheets and linens directly beneath your thighs are soaked through by your ill-advised wetting experiment, with a comically large dry spot left where your huge diaper was sited. Now that you're not quite so intoxicated by your situation, you realise with a sigh and a frown that you're going to be culpable for cleaning it up - preferably before mom finds out you've been messing around with an oversized diaper and way too much water.

You reluctantly begin to shuffle to the edge of the bed, readying yourself for the chore of cleaning your sheets and eventually changing your leaky padding, but one last glance over at the X-LAX box tempts you into hesitance. You know it's a stupid idea, but... you've already made a mess, right? What's the harm in really pulling out all the stops?
1242311.title: Getting Extra-Soaked

choices: Drift off and deal with the consequences later
Try to stem the flow long enough to get up and change
12423112.content:
You decide that you're not in the mood for being responsible or sensible as you struggle to reach for the laxative pills - you might be less than a year away from adulthood, but you're sat there in a pyjama shirt, a soaking diaper and a wet bed, so how much of an adult can you honestly expect yourself to be? You take some comfort in your juvenile logic as you whip out the foil-covered platter of capsules. A few are already gone - victims of previous nights of messy fun, no doubt - but there's still plenty to be consumed. You peel back the foil on one, then two - then, as a wry smile creeps along your beak, a third. You slot the rest back into their box, pretending not to have noticed the 'take one per day' directive printed on the back, then allow yourself to topple back into a lying position, eliciting a satisfying squish from your diaper as you knock back the trio of bowel-cleaning capsules.

It takes far less time for the potent medicine to kick in than the water from earlier. You're just getting comfortable in your damp bed and your damp undergarments, lying back and happily squeezing and squishing away at your warm, leaky crotch, when you feel a sudden cramp tighten around your guts. You wince and groan as another telltale cramp runs along your stomach, then another around your bowels. Before you can make yourself react to what's going on or even brace for the inevitable, you feel your back end go a little numb and relax, opening wide to permit the first of many laxative-induced loads.

The first few loads come so quickly that you barely realise you've pooped yourself. The soft, warm bowel mass slides out of you easily and smushes up in the space between your butt and the soaked layers of your diaper, pushing your midriff up off the bed slightly. You let out something between a gasp of surprise and a grateful moan as the load beneath you grows larger, forcing more formerly-absorbed liquid out of your diaper and onto the sheets below as the space around your backside fills out with a hot, soft, squishy pillow of your own making. You manage to gather the presence of mind to lift your legs up, pulling up your knees and giving your ample diaper plenty of room in which to become even more ample as it expands over your tail feathers and the wide patch of dry bed that it protected previously.

You're fairly certain that your mess isn't coming out in separate loads now - more like one continuous, unbroken bowel movement that pushes your undergarment still further out as it ejects itself from your back end. You're gripping the front of your diaper for dear life now, huffing loudly and squeezing tightly as the intense sensation of the massive load leaves you all but paralysed. You can't see much from where you are, but your diaper is now bulging higher than your midriff, having raised your back end up a few inches with the cushion of poop you've created. It's all a lot to take in, especially combined with the fact that you still feel very full...

Between the gentle pain of the gut cramps, the pleasure of filling your diaper for all it's worth, and the comfort of lying there in your cosy, soft mess, it's getting tough to stay coherent. You're tempted to just let yourself pass out - you'd miss out on the rest of the filling, sure, but you'd definitely get to wake up to a nice surprise. You know that it has to stop somewhere and that you should get up and get changed, but this whole affair has really tired you out...
12423112.title: Making a Messy Situation Messier

choices: Meekly request your mom's help in cleaning up
Tell her you'll handle it yourself
124231121.content:
It's tough not to give in to the allure of a well-deserved rest, especially with the comfy, squishy sensations in your rear end putting you at such ease. Tearing your gaze away from your slowly-expanding diaper, you let your head drop back on the pillow behind you and quickly start drifting into a mid-afternoon nap. You've got it all planned out, you think to yourself over the quiet squishing and crinkling noises emanating from beneath you. You'll take a quick rest now, then get up and deal with everything later. Yes, just a quick rest... there's plenty of time left in the day... with a final satisfied sigh, you fall asleep, your over-filled diaper still growing between your legs.

"Oh my God, Kel..."

The sound of your name (or at least, your nickname) causes you to jar from your nap suddenly. One by one, your other senses tune back in to the waking world - your eyes, first, squint out through the low light in your room. It must be evening, surely, or later - dread begins to settle in your gut as you try to work out just how long you've been asleep for. Your beak twitches and you scrunch your mouth up a little as your nostrils inform you that it kind of stinks in here. The most pressing matter, however, is to find out who woke you up - and there's only one person it could be.

"M-mom!" you stammer briefly, fumbling both with your sheets and your wide-open pyjama shirt in an attempt to conceal your modesty. As you prop yourself up on your elbows in order to get a better look at the parent who woke you, you realise that her eyes aren't drawn to yours, or to the bare chest that you failed to cover up - rather, she's staring wide-eyed at the absolutely gargantuan undergarment between your legs. Amazingly, it's even bigger than you remember it. Your mid-nap messing caused it to swell down to your-- no, past your feet, and now it bulges insistently against the other end of your bed. One of your legs is splayed off to one side beside it, while the other is resting comfortably atop it, cocked up like a canine. Worst of all, it leaked everywhere while you were out cold - practically the entire bed is damp in one place or another, and you realise with a burning blush that your feathers are feeling sort of soggy too. It's not quite as warm as it was however long ago, but you have to admit that it's still kind of comfy to sit on... either way, your mom tears your attention away from it with a disappointed sigh.

"Kelly... what were you thinking?" she starts, placing a hand on her beak and shaking her head in a manner that suggested far more exasperation than anger. "You've gotten it everywhere. What do you think diapers are for in the first place, hm?" She folds her arms over her blouse, cocking her head and raising an eyebrow expectantly. She's wearing a knee-length skirt, too - you know well what it conceals, but at the moment, all eyes are on your diaper, not hers.
124231121.title: Caught!

1242311212.content:
"I, er-- I was just gonna clean up, I promise!" you stammer, offering your mom a sheepish, blush-ridden grin.

"I should think so, Kel," she retorts, her eyes drifting down to your over-full diaper again before meeting your gaze firmly. "I don't even want to know how you made this much in the first place, but I know it wasn't an accident, was it? You're not a baby any more, you know full well that you shouldn't be doing things like this..." She tails off a little as she stares you down accusingly, her expression proceeding to soften a little as she looks at your blushing, humiliated features. You think she must've realised the futility of telling someone wearing a diaper nearly as big as themselves to stop acting like a baby. Surely, too, she knows how tempting it is to just make the most of the padding you're both stuck in... either way, the frustrated edge seems to have left her words when she speaks again. "Drag that thing out of bed and go take a shower, alright? I'll get the bed-sheets for you."

You nod gratefully and move to start hauling your diapered backside out of the ruined bed you've been residing in. "Thanks, mom..!" you manage as you plant your feet on the floor, then struggle to step forward, hauling your huge, soaked load behind you. The mighty thud it makes when it hits the floor behind you makes both you and mom wince a little. Once it's there, however, it's surprisingly a little easier to waddle around with than you expected. Your mom gives you and your baggage plenty of room on the way out, and you manage to occupy every inch of it, narrowly avoiding getting stuck in the doorway.

"Oh, and Kel?" you hear behind you as you push open the bathroom door.

"Yeah, mom?"

"Try not to burn through these too fast, would you?" she requests, holding up the half-empty box of pills and wearing a cheeky smile across her beak. "You're not the only one who likes using them, y'know." With a knowing nod, she ducks into your room, presumably to get busy cleaning up after you. The smirk that crosses your face as you think about what she meant by that sticks with you long after you're cleaned up, freshly padded up and nestled up in a clean, cosy bed.
1242311212.title: Cleaning Up

choices: Throw on some extra-stretchy pants and get moving (or waddling)
1242312.content:
You decide to give yourself the 'full' diaper experience as you skilfully pluck a couple of laxative pills from their foil platter. One hand playfully squeezes the crotch of your cosy, soaked padding while the other gently throws the X-LAX capsules down your throat, allowing you to gulp them down. Just the thought of how your drenched diaper will look once you've added some real weight to it is enough to make you blush gently as you settle down into your padding, enjoying your warm, damp cushion while it lasts. The groans and gurgles of your laxative-laced gut are music to your ears; a gentle but insistent reminder of what's to come as the minutes pass.

You barely even notice when the first load comes. You're so busy squeezing your damp diaper and shifting from side to side in its wet confines that the feeling of your backside releasing a sizeable dump into the seat of your undergarment gives you a small shock. The second of multiple loads makes itself known before you can really react, pushing up against your butt and your padding with a soft squish. Your diaper sways below you as you pull yourself into a kneeling position, widening your legs again to give your gut the easiest path to emptying itself. Lump after lump of your bowel mass fills the back of your padding like a bumpy, crinkly balloon, creating a soil-coloured cushion that would've sagged past your knees if your soaking hasn't already brought your diaper down to that level. The squishing, crinkling noise of your diaper being pumped full of your product provides a nice soundtrack to the hot, cosy sensation of your mess pushing against your butt, and you let out a fond sigh as your legs widen further and you sink into your huge diaper.

It takes a few minutes for most of your load to find its way out of your rear end, but to you, it all went by too fast. You huff quietly as one hand squeezes your damp, crinkly crotch and the other goes to your backside, sinking into the gigantic mudslide packaged around your rear. Wet padding and soft mess alike rubs up against you, and it feels absolutely wonderful. You're glad you took one from your thickest pack of diapers last night - a lesser garment would never have been able to handle a load this big.

"Kelly!" The exclamation of your name from somewhere else in the house jars you out of your diaper-loving stupor. It's your mom calling - and at the worst possible time, too, you think to yourself as your eyes drift down to your immobilising padding. "Come and help me with dinner, please!" You roll your eyes as your mom finishes her request. You hope to yourself that she'll reconsider letting you anywhere near food once she sees how unhygienic you're being, as you reluctantly shuffle your way to the edge of the bed and struggle to plant your feet on the ground. Your mess grinds up against your backside as you drag your diaper around, causing your blush to return in full force.

The weight and girth of your garment makes it almost impossible to walk around, and you can't even imagine how you'd tackle stairs. You're going to need something to help distribute the weight more evenly, you decide as your gaze wanders to your closet. Then again... maybe you could just pretend to be asleep and dodge the whole chore altogether?
1242312.title: Filling to Capacity

choices: Drop the laxative in your own bowl
Drop the laxative in your mom's bowl
12423121.content:
With lots of huffing and awkward waddling, you finally make your way to your closet. Pulling the door open, you appraise your wide selection of clothes briefly before your eyes settle on the only logical choice for your pants - an extremely stretchy and durable pair of sweatpants, something you recall purchasing for the exact purpose of containing and concealing your thicker diapers. Getting them on is a needlessly tough struggle that pushes your back-bulge around into all kinds of places, but finally, you pull the waistband up over your padding's waist gains and let it snap into place with a satisfied huff. The elastic fabric compresses your undergarment tightly, leaving you feeling very snug amongst your mess. Make no mistake, it's still absolutely obvious that you've got a diaper the size of an exercise ball wrapped around your lower half, but considering you've managed to bring it up to your knees after it was sagging almost to your ankles, you're satisfied nevertheless.

A petite bra and a loose t-shirt replace your pyjama shirt, and with that, you're ready to tackle the day - or, at least, you're ready to waddle around the house a little. The stairs still present an interesting challenge as you make your way down them, but the feeling of your huge, cosy load mushing up against you with every step - not to mention the audible squishing and crinkling noises - is enough encouragement to keep you moving. In short order, you arrive in the kitchen, meeting your mom as she stirs a bowl of something you can't quite see. She looks a lot like you, except about twenty years older, and she's sporting a practical blouse and knee-length skirt covered by an apron. She bends over in order to add a minute amount of some seasoning to whatever she's preparing, causing the subtle, but still-obvious outline of her padding to appear against the back of her skirt.

"Hi, Kel, can you-- oh, my goodness..." she starts as she turns to greet you, trailing off as her eyes instantly snap to the obscenely large diaper bulge straining against your pants. "Couldn't you have changed first?" she continues, giving you a look of both exasperation and sheer surprise - she's no stranger to the size of your loads, but this one is an outlier, even for yourself.

"I kinda woke up like this, mom," you lie seamlessly, giving her a self-assured smile as you pull up the waist of your sweatpants slightly. "I didn't wanna keep you waiting. I'd need a shower for something this big, right?"

"Alright, fine," your mom sighs, rolling her eyes. "But you're definitely getting a change after dinner, Kel. Or-- I guess it'd be breakfast for you, hm?" She smirks at you sarcastically and folds her arms, and you shrug plaintively in response - you can't really deny that you've been sleeping way too late recently. With the pleasantries out of the way, she hands you the large wooden spoon she was using to stir whatever she's cooking. "Keep an eye on the stew for me, alright? Just give it a stir if it starts to boil."

It's an easy job - too easy, in fact. You stand with your eyes on the pot of stew, legs spread to give your gigantic diaper a little room, and dutifully stir. Your free hand finds it way into your pocket as boredom starts to creep in-- hold on, what's this? Your claws close around a small capsule buried deep within the confines of your pocket. You don't need to pull it out to know what you've found - it's a spare X-LAX. You remember setting it aside the last time you wore these pants, intending to use it once you had some privacy - you must've forgotten, though, and now you're presented with an opportunity, you realise as your eyes drift to the two bowls your mom set out for the stew. You're sorely tempted to add even more mass to your over-stretched diaper before you're forced to change, but... maybe your mom could do with feeling how nice a huge, laxative-induced load feels?

"Alright, Kel, dish it out for me, please," she chimes in from the dining room. You cast a glance back to see her setting the table out, leaving you in relative privacy for your scheme. The question remains, though - will it be your diaper that ends up a few pounds heavier, or hers?
12423121.title: Dinner Duties

choices: Insist that she changes before you do
Give her some encouragement to savour her packed padding for once
124231212.content:
It's an easy choice, you think to yourself as you split the two sides of the capsule open and let the powdery grains of bowel-accelerating chemicals drop into the bowl beside you. After all, you're already struggling to contain all of your mess - it'd just be selfish to keep even more of it to yourself. Quickly, you lump a ladle-ful of stew on top of the powder, give it a quick stir, then fill the rest of the bowl to capacity. You fill your own bowl, too, making a quick mental note of which one you've sabotaged, then take them both into the dining room. You set your mom's bowl down at her seat with an award-winning innocent smile, then you both sit down - or, rather, your mom sits down while you struggle to heft your over-full diaper into position, then slowly sink into it as you drop yourself onto your seat. You blush and smile sheepishly over to your mom as your pants bulge out over the sides of your chair.

"That change really had to wait, huh?" she teases, giving you a look of joking disapproval as you finally settle in your seat.

"I just didn't wanna miss dinner!" you reply with a smile, sinking your spoon into your bowl and giving off your best impression of someone who's totally innocent of any laxative-related wrongdoing. Your mom seems convinced - or, at least, she has no reason to suspect anything, as she also makes a start on her food.

Dinner passes quietly and without incident, save for the occasional smirk you fail to hold back as you imagine the consequences of your little act of sabotage. Fortunately, you avoid any suspicion, and you excuse yourself politely once your bowl is empty. Your diaper sags back into its original position as you stand up, causing you to stumble ever-so-slightly - your stool is a little too soft to maintain the shape of the chair you were sat in, and your stretchy pants eagerly squeeze your over-packed padding back into a mostly spherical shape.

"Alright, Kel, go and hop in the shower. I'll take care of the old diaper for you once I'm finished with the dishes." You nod affirmatively and half-walk, half-waddle off towards the stairs as your mom takes both bowls into the kitchen - then, once she's out of sight, you double back as quietly as your diaper will permit, hoping that the rushing tap water will disguise your crinkling movements as you peek into the kitchen. Free of its capsule, the laxative should act a lot more rapidly then usual - and you've got front-row seating.

At first, nothing seems amiss. Your mom dutifully sponges one of the bowls clean, rinses it out under the tap, then sets it aside, working with years of experience on her side. 1253322222221.content:
As you were sound asleep you are awaken as the warm rays of the sun shine on your face. Slowly your forced into wakefulness as you snuggle into the large arms of... wait, what? Last time you checked you live alone in an apartment. Opening your eyes the fist thing you realize is that this isn't your room. Everything is pink and there are toys on the floor and even a doll in your clutches. There is a toy box next to a large doll house and in the corner a diaper changing station. Next thing you see as you turn your head to see who your snuggled up with you see that your with what you can only describe as a giant anthro little dog girl.

Naturally you react in the only way you can think of at the moment. "Ahahahahahahahahaha!" As you scream and try to get away rolling off the giant cushion that you were just using as a bed. "Whats wrong Missy? Have a bad dream?" Asked the giant 7 year old as she rubs the sleep from her eyes and gets up. You try to crawl away but dong get far as her powerful paw like hands find themselves under your arm pits as she lifts you up and hugs you tight and rubbing your back while whispering comforting words to you.

This seams to work as you stop your screams and useless struggles as the giant child happily keeps the embrace. Calming down some you hear the door burst open. "Sasha! What happened? Is Missy ok?"

"Shes ok mommy she just had a bad dream." Said the giant girl that now held you in her arms. With a sigh of relief the new bigger giantess walks forward and leans down to make you the meat in a hug sandwich. Looking up at the newcomer you see that like the not so little girl shes a giant light blue anthro dog.

"Poor baby. Its ok hugs make everything better." Said the girls mother. "Do you mind changing Missy while I go get breakfast Sasha?"

"Yes mommy." Sasha replied as she and you get petted by the adult before she rose up to her full height and left. :Come on Missy lets get you a nice fresh diaper."
You, who were keeping quiet this whole time do to your brain trying to proses all of this, were shocked out of your stupor at her statement as you look down at yourself and see that your covered in the same fur as them. Your body is also chubbier yet not fat like a baby, a fact that hits harder as you see that your also wearing a wet diaper. As your laid down on the changing table and Sasha rips the tabs of your diaper off and lets it fall down between your legs you try to talk to her. To let her know that you weren't her baby sister and that you needed help. But all that came out were unintelligible baby talk. Frustrated and embarrassed that there is nothing you can do at the moment and this child you don't even know has just finished wiping you clean and is rubbing lotion on your privets before getting a new diaper on you.

You then get to go threw the joys of playing a small game of dress up as Sasha has fun dolling you up in a blue dress that fails yo cover your diaper dose your hair adding a couple of red bows to it. Satisfied with her work and taking a moment to tell you how adorable you are she then strips her pj's and dresses herself in her own dress. Having gotten ready she once again picks you up and carries you out the hall and over to the kitchen. Her mother walks over and takes toy allowing the girl to take her seat and start eating.

Next thing you know you have the nipple of a baby bottle shoved in your mouth. Feeling mentally exhausted after all of this you don't even fight in as you are feeling hungry, its actually quite sweet and warm. When you finally finished the bottle a strong discomfort churns inside you until you find your head resting on her shoulder and her large hand patting you on the back until you let out a mighty burp. Now that her kids have been fed the mother declares that.

info.brief_description: You become a furry that wears diapers.
info.description:
You are a furry and you wear diapers. Why? You'll have to explain that yourself.

RULES:
1: No sex or masturbation
2: Please do keep any romances light.
3: Try to keep it as tasteful as this subject can be.
4: No pointless choices. What someone is eating for breakfast is not usually important enough to branch out into a whole freaking separate story line.
5: No chapters that are only one sentence and a choice.
6: Stay in Second-Person Perspective (You). Remember, the story is about YOU, not some random two-year old. Chapters that violate this rule will be deleted. No exceptions.
